channel.title: Haunted Hotel Recommendations
channel.description:
Im just wondering if anyone here has been to the Haunted Hotel in San Diego? Heres the website [url=http://www.hauntedhotel.com/]http://www.hauntedhotel.com/[/url]
The ticket is about 45$ and im just wondering if the ticket will be worth it. The whole attraction is about 1 hour. A 34 foot Haunted Hotel.
Watch the videos and please tell me [img]http://12.47.45.83/rendered/cooltext402782771.gif[/img]

@pk4pk wrote:

Yeah, unless you’re going with a girl who’s crazy hot but for some reason is willing to touch you.

Haa well if you make it through, you get your 45$ back… Im takin my mom does that count XD?

Stop bullshitin us. Is there a possibility you will die in there. Wtf.
[/quote]Maybe its like some sort of maze?[/quote]
So then you can never get out? Or are you gunna go up to count faggit and say i quit??

item.title: Haunted Hotel Recommendations
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Anybody been to fright nights at thorpe park? (United Kingdom only k)
I went a year or two ago, they had something they called “The asylum” Basically it was a mock up of a run down mental asylum. The whole house was filled with strobe lights and they had a ton of actors dressed up with blood all over them. I gotta say it was really fun to go through. Felt really out of place yet fun.

Read full topic

item.title: Haunted Hotel Recommendations
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I wouldn’t do it, mainly because the sound of young drunk teenage girls screaming every 2 seconds doesn’t turn me on. And because I wouldn’t enjoy going to an attraction where I’m suposed to get scared, but I’m expecting it to happen, making it less enjoyable. And $45.00 is way too expensive for just an hour of actors jumping out at you, or running through slime and ‘dead’ bodies.

Read full topic
